H0.text: What type of beer does Homer Simpson drink. Budweiser

H1.text: What type of beer does Homer Simpson drink. Coors

H2.text: What type of beer does Homer Simpson drink. Pabst Blue Ribbon

H3.text: What type of beer does Homer Simpson drink. Duff

A4.text: He frequently spends his evenings drinking Duff Beer at Moe's Tavern
